diff_act: 1.flash a light on the control panel
2.produce a beep sound through the loudspeaker
3.notify the driver that the call has been successfully established

regen.absent_element: notification of network issues to the driver
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an audible and visual indication to the driver in case of network issues, specifying the nature of the problem.

label: The functional identity includes the engine number, if no train number is available.
absence: situation of no train number is available
